_route: (==) This is the Omegafairy v2 (2022-07-28) version of the route.

_Material<Flint>.notes: To set a campfire without fire arrows

.!!(SAVE THE GAME).notes: Do .!!(NOT) manually save until after dupe is complete. .link([Why not?]https://pastebin.com/MN1c2gAR)

_Material<2 Endura Shroom>.notes: Do not eat. Will need for stamina food.

_Material<10 Hearty Durians>.notes: Use for food; save 1 for quest

_Chest<3 Ancient Arrows>.notes: Don't pick up the Royal Bow

Kill 1-3 .enemy(Stalkers).notes: Skip gears. Continue even if less than 3 screws. Don't take more than 2 Spring, 1 Shaft. Take core if one drops.

BLSS .dir(S) + WB .dir(S) to .loc(Riola.notes: (Backup/safety) There are chests with shock arrows and a Phrenic Bow in the spring

_Material<2 Lizalfos Talon>.notes: Kill the green or blue lizalfos if missing a horn or talon

.!!(Bombs+ Stasis+).notes: If less than 3 screws, upgrade slate in Hateno 2

.!!(Save and close software).notes: Clears inventory glitch and warps back up to tech lab

_Npc::SheikaMale<Olkin>.notes: Goes to northern campfire at 5pm; starts running around the village at 8pm

_Tod::Morning.notes: Timing for ice house after Naboris (opens at 7am)

.dir(E) + midair.notes: Wait until Riju's question, then choose "Keep up the fight!" Use minimap to find Naboris.

_Npc<Beedle>.notes: Beedle leaves at 4pm. Make noon if needed.

_Shop<1 Warm Darner>.notes: If Maypin (donkey) shows up, buy 1 warm darner and 2 cold darners from Maypin. Then cook the cold elixir with 1 cold darner instead of a butterfly.

_Tod::Noon.notes: Timing to reach Suma Sahma between 4:00pm and 5:30pm. If you're missing the window, make noon later in this segment.

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Intentionally "wasting" a fury. Looking for amber, flint, and luminous stones.

.dir(<<E).notes: See map for where to drop in

Begin Naydra sequence.notes: Shoot an eye before each of the following three koroks (N24, N31, N39)

_Tod::Morning.notes: If between 12:00pm and 5:00am, need to make morning twice to properly advance a day so Naydra spawns

_Boss::Hinox::Blue.notes: (Optional) Take a Knight's Bow (metal) for Eldin

_Discover<Luto's Crossing>.notes: Try to discover location as you fly past

Complete divine beast.notes: Use 2 WBs to get to terminal 1. Use gale after terminal 5 to get to boss room.

_Npc::ZoraMale<Fronk>.notes: 7:00am to 8:00pm, .link([Fronk is at the pillar]https://youtu.be/gQH8hwsckaM?t=13565). Otherwise he is .link([at the pools]https://youtu.be/3EltLt0dpks?t=2686).

_Npc::ZoraMale<Gruve>.notes: Quest reward is 5 Fleet-Lotus Seed, will use for transmute.

_Korok::Z19.notes: Combo with Z20. Do 2 flowers of Z20 then jump down.

_Shrine::DahHesho.notes: Fight minor tests with .rune(Stasis) and 2 ancient arrows

Equip metal shield.notes: Bow will burn after 30s on fire or after entering some cutscenes while on fire. Cancel bow burning by pressing ZR, B.

.dir(<W).notes: Windbombs won't work on the first (and only the first) tick of burn damage. Either go fast or wait until the second tick.

_Discover<Stolock Bridge>.notes: Can discover by gliding over. Landing on the bridge will trigger the Rudania cutscene (make sure bow is not burning if you do).

.dir(S.).notes: If you didn't land on the bridge before, the Rudania cutscene will trigger here

_Korok::E06.notes: Rare ore deposit here for amber if still needed

_Boss::Talus::Igneo.notes: Igneo taluses have the best chance to drop flint for Jewel Trade. Collect drops here and with remaining three igneo taluses until you have 11 flint.

Ride minecart.notes: .rune(Stasis) the minecart once you have a good angle

midair .dir(N>).notes: See map for where to drop in

_Tod::Morning.notes: To spawn Dinraal. If it's between 12:00am and 5:00am, make morning twice to properly advance a day.

_Material<Lynel Hoof>.notes: Hoof is for Riddles of Hyrule. High chance of getting one, but if you don't, kill lynel near E01.

Shoot Dinraal (Scale).notes: Ok to use a gale here to get the scale. In that case, skip gale 3 in maze.

_Tod::Morning.notes: Look WEST back toward Qaza Tokki when sitting at campfire. Facing east can stop Dinraal from spawning.

_Korok::E01.notes: (Optional) Kill .enemy(Lynel) here if previous Lynel didn't drop hoof

Shoot Dinraal (Horn).notes: If you miss any parts, windbomb WEST or warp to Qaza Tokki, make morning, and return to the area to respawn Dinraal

_Snap::Quest<Kilton>.notes: It's common for the camera to not register Kilton. Take 3 snaps from different angles to be safe.

Look up .!!(East) in the sky.notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

_Korok::A02.notes: If it's raining/going to rain, make noon here under enemy camp. Need clear skies for blue flame.

.dir(N>) to .loc(Lomei Labyrinth).notes: See map for where to drop in

_Tod::Night.notes: For stalhorse, stalnox, and quests after Rudania

Enter Rudania.notes: Ancient arrow everything. Break ores during escort if missing amber (10) or flint (11)

_Chest<Knight's Bow>.notes: Need a single shot bow for the trickshot and a metal bow for later Eldin. Get this one if you didn't pick up one earlier.

_Boss::Talus::Igneo.notes: Get any missing luminous stones here

_Discover<Lost Woods>.notes: BLSS should pass through this location

_Npc<Tasho>.notes: Move forward until you hear Oaki's dialogue to trigger the escort. Don't need to follow Oaki; he'll move along his path while we do the next steps.

Activate .loc(Keo Ruug).notes: .!!(DON'T) enter shrine or Oaki will reset

_Material<2 Bird Egg>.notes: In tree behind Hestu. For korok later.

Equip Lynel Crusher.notes: Pulling the Master Sword sets durability of equipped weapon to 40. Crusher used for Moldugas later.

Follow Oaki.notes: Follow Blue Nightshades and clearings on map

_Material<10 Restless Cricket>.notes: Spin attack grass to collect during escort

_Shrine::DaagChokah.notes: Oaki finishes his walk 5h 20m in-game time from when the quest starts. Don't approach until you see the dialogue "Woo! I finally made it!"

_Equipment::Shield<Rusty Shield>.notes: Keep the shield for a korok later

.dir(S>>) + .dir(S) midairs.notes: .link([Easier movement without midairs]https://twitter.com/TaoPlusPlus/status/1525684201256787968?s=20&t=B-BWPy4MWcQnNr5kUJ9Tkg). Can also equip metal bow, warp to Eldin Tower and BLSS.

_Korok::X03.notes: To do a Daruk Shield Block, equip bomb, hold ZL (shield), jump, let go of ZL in midair, double tap L.

_Tod::Night.notes: (Optional) If close to blood moon, making night will cancel it while you're in castle and give you enough time to get to Mijah Rokee.

Steal 1 bow from .enemy(lizalfos).notes: To fill up bow. Can also pick up missing Lizalfos Horn here.

_Equipment::Weapon<Great Flameblade>.notes: This and the Thunderblade are high durability weapons for tree chopping

_Material<1 Silent Princess>.notes: Should have 19. If not, backup at fairy fountains later.

Clip out to .loc(Guard's Chamber).notes: .link([Example clip and oob movement]https://youtu.be/7WOPfp1bGog?list=PLxRHLKOlaIbj6REgghSRSqMeAPxUX33ax&t=25938). Fix ragdoll before next windbomb.

_Korok::X21.notes: Shoot the top with normal arrows

_Korok::X22.notes: Aim at top of the wall in background

_Material<18 Acorn>.notes: Each big tree has 6 acorns. Use stasis to see them.

_Shrine::MijahRokee.notes: If you missed the blood moon, continue with the route and warp back. You'll get at least 3 blood moons in the run.

_Material<3 Acorn>.notes: Need to pick up 8 more rng acorns during the run

_Tod::Noon.notes: For Sasa Kai timing. Can make noon later in this segment for more margin of error.

_Korok::G35.notes: Pre-aim, walk onto start block, instant square-first windbomb

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Stand on pillar with cube for G21

_Korok::W02.notes: Keep 4+ Mighty Bananas for transmute at the end

_Npc::Gerudo<Malena>.notes: Medicinal Molduga; before 2pm she's in the training yard

_Tod::Night.notes: For Salvager chest when you get to Bridge of Hylia

.dir(E).notes: If raining, make night until it's not for D54

Look .!!(Southeast) in the sky.notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

Leave horse.notes: Sets up the horse for easy pickup later

_Korok::L65.notes: Do not whistle sprint until after Shoqa Tatone

_Tod::Night.notes: For the Stalnoxes coming up (if needed)

_Korok::P08.notes: Use .rune(Cryo) to move the log into position

Kill .enemy(Stalkoblin).notes: Need to get here before 5am. Backup in Kakariko later.

_Korok::D41.notes: Precise bomb arrow shot to get the boulder rolling

_Korok::F48.notes: There are banana trees next to this korok

.fury() .!!(Enemy Camp).notes: Ancient arrow on the one blue bokoblin that doesn't get hit by furies

_Korok::F28.notes: Use gale only if raining; use after F27 otherwise

_Npc<Rozel>.notes: Inside house under F44 if raining. Sunken Treasure.

Shoot letter.notes: When you return to Finley, the letter will respawn on land

Deliver letter BLSS.notes: .link([Example BLSS]https://youtu.be/CCYh2UXCDk4?t=9413), fall and let Mipha's Grace/fairy protect you, don't pull glider, and the letter will survive

_Tod::Noon.notes: (Optional) You need to make it to Shamae at Mirro Shaz before 8pm and need it be after 9pm for a Stalnox

_Korok::C50.notes: This is the "Chaos Ranch." For safety, ancient arrow everything before starting the chase.

_Npc<Shamae>.notes: Make noon if needed. For Balloon Flight.

_Shrine::MirroShaz.notes: Stalnox coming up. Make night if needed. .link([Shrine Strat]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MZqANcvFr4c&t=7474s)

_Discover<Rauru Settlement Ruins>.notes: With superlaunch, can get this location while gilding through on the way to Helmhead Bridge

_Korok::R23.notes: Complete R24 before the last flower of R23

_Tod::Night.notes: (Optional) Stalnox coming up, make night if after midnight. Also use this in case it's raining.

_Korok::R55.notes: Drop a bomb to blow up the stal enemies as you're gliding over

_Korok::R50.notes: Shoot bomb arrow from high above

Activate .!!(Pedestal).notes: Talk to Kheel for Korok leaf if you don't have one

_Korok::H07.notes: Pre-aim, walk onto start block, instant square-first windbomb

Start T06 race.notes: Combo T06 with H53, H60, and T08. If you make a mistake, you can finish T06 right after H60. Then do T08 to T07.

_Npc<Hudson>.notes: (Optional) Buy extra fire arrows from Fyson

_Npc<Tumbo>.notes: Wakes up at 7am. In front of Mipha's statue.

_Npc<Torfeau>.notes: For these NPCs, make a counterclockwise run around the pools under the throne room

.dir(W>).notes: Curve the windbomb over bridge ruins to discover location and then land at rock

_Npc<Jana>.notes: Get here before 8pm. Make noon if needed. Little Sister's Big Request.

_Korok::N54.notes: Palm fruit on nearby tree if needed

_Equipment::Weapon<Traveler's Sword>.notes: (Optional) Backup if you missed at Shee Vaneer

_Npc<Koko>.notes: Swift carrot, goat butter, raw meat, courser bee honey

Collect fireflies.notes: If you miss some and scare the rest away, you can respawn them by warping to Taloh Naeg

_Tod::Night.notes: Because shrine quest sets time of day to 7:00pm

Kill .enemy(Yiga Blademaster).notes: 2 headshots with GEB and normal arrows will make the blademaster drop his weapon

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: If you don't make it here in time, continue and make night before entering Toto Sah. Then kill the Stalnox after D56.

_Chest<Sapphire>.comment: Up in cave behind rock pile

_Npc<Calip>.notes: If it's not raining, Calip leaves at 6:00am. Sleep in bed if he's not here. Cancel dialogue.

_Npc<Clavia>.notes: (Optional) If you didn't talk to her during inventory corruption

_Npc<Symin>.notes: Talk 3 times until you get the Hearty Truffle reward. Then talk again and make sure to select "I'm good".

midair .dir(S>).notes: Jump out to avoid low ceiling

_Tod::Night.notes: (Optional) For Salvager chest. Make night if here after 2:30am.

Look .!!(Southeast) in the sky.notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

.dir(SW) run.notes: Can shield jump onto ice or shoot a fire arrow between the ice blocks and run through

.dir(<S).notes: Pick up/put down rock and stand on it to windbomb

.!!(Upgrade armor).notes: Last 2 set of the wild, Zora Helm + Zora Greaves, Champion's Tunic + Zora Armor, remaing Set of the Wild

_Npc<Hagie>.notes: Western end of town past cook pot

_Npc<Hudson>.notes: Talk to him again after the wedding
